articles.title: Melbourne star denies agreement with Sydney club - Zero Tackle
articles.description: The Storm winger has dampened reports of an agreement with a rival club.
articles.content: Melbourne star Josh Addo-Carr has denied reports suggesting he had signed a non-binding, heads over agreement with Wests Tigers as he and his management haven’t spoken “since the start of the finals”… [+1142 chars]
